description: cPickle is a faster implementation than pickle. We should just be using cPickle everywhere we are using pickle. See http://docs.python.org/library/pickle.html#module-cPickle
title: import pickle should be import cPickle

comments.content: cPickle is a faster implementation than pickle. We should just be using cPickle everywhere we are using pickle. See http://docs.python.org/library/pickle.html#module-cPickle

commit 00592cfa0b90c66682be2bc31428277c35a35c48
Author: Alex Meade <email address hidden>

    Use cPickle and not just pickle.
    
    Fixes bug 953423
    
    cPickle is up to 1000 times faster than pickle. We should use it instead.
